Posts.Content: May 20, 2010 06:43AM lindamsn wrote: marybe, Did my first week of Xeloda and now on week off.  Sunday started mouth problems-feels burned on tongue and gums then sores came on tongue and one on inside lip.  Better after 4 days.  I am prone to mouth problems so not surprised.  Some dia. this week but controled by Imodium.  Able to eat pretty good.   Dr says my body should adjust to the drug and SE lessen.  Will update you.

Posts.Content: May 8, 2010 10:25AM - edited May 8, 2010 10:32AM by lindamsn I was on 5-FU in '93 with 2 other drugs but never had the peeling, sore hands or feet so that is a new SE as far as I know.  I start the Xeloda tomorrow so will see how it goes and post here.  I can tell you that I read some good things about it on the Xeloda website-comments/reviews.  Also I called their hotline and they have, what seems to be so far, a great phone line support system.  Answered all the questions I had.  Have called them twice.
